system.description: Character has earned the right to possess a Sacred Relic as part of their Standard Kit, such as the fingerbone of an imperial saint, or a scrap of Death Shroud that covered the remains of a Lord General. Whilst the Relic is displayed, all allies within 30 metres gain +20 to resist Fear and Pinning, as well as Tests to avoid gaining Corruption or Insanity Points. If the Relic is Lost or Destroyed, the character brings a deep shame to themselves, they immediately lose all remaining Fate Points for the session and cease to gain benefit from this talent until the relic is recovered or restored.
